description:
Course for everyone who want to make more money, get better job by using fluent Word Skills.

Useful for bloggers, editors, freelancers, office-managers, entrepreneurs, and also for everyone who is looking/planning to change the job/put forward career or business.

On this course you will know how to create gorgeous documents: reports, resumes, book's pages, magazine's covers and pages and so on. You will teach practical skills for your professional growing. Course includes more than 10 practical cases, each case explains step by step how to use Word's functions on practice for creation absolutely amazing documents.
title: Word 2016 For Mac: Put Forward Your Career/Business
